p: Rhinovirus is a major cause of common cold and it is associated with asthma exacerbations (Jartti and Korppi 2011). It has been demonstrated that RV16 infection of primary bronchial epithelial cells results in the induction of hBD2 and hBD3 mRNA, whereas hBD1 remains unaltered (Duits et al. 2003). It was also demonstrated that the same serotype also upregulated hBD2 mRNA and protein in A549 alveolar epithelial cells. Interestingly this effect was conserved in other major group serotype HRV-14 or in 2 minor group serotypes such as HRV-2 and HRV-1A.
